nodes.text: Krovis was a male commodore of the Galactic Empire and the superior of an Imperial heavy freighter crew during the Galactic Civil War. In 3 ABY, the Imperial defector Governor Everi Chalis, working for the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry, contacted the freighter, pretending that she was still a member of the Empire. Intending to direct the freighter into a trap, she threatened the crew of the freighter, claiming they were in danger from an ion storm. Chalis referenced Krovis specifically, claiming she could have him tried for incompetence.
Krovis was first mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
